title: Hunter Pence Rap (Feat. San Francisco Giant Hunter Pence)(Kinda Funny Shorts)
description:
The San Francisco Giants face-off against the Kansas City Royals in the 2014 World Series! Show your SF love by sharing this video with your friends!

Download the song here! https://gameovergreggy.bandcamp.com/track/hunterpencesigns-rap-feat-hunter-pence

Support us here: http://www.patreon.com/kindafunny

The Hunter Pence Sign phenomenon gets it's own Lonely Island-style music video by Tim Gettys and Alexis Cozombolidis.

Follow us on Twitter:
Tim - http://www.twitter.com/TimGettys
Alexis - http://www.twitter.com/LetsGetLexi

Subscribe! http://www.youtube.com/subscription_center?add_user=gameovergreggy

Lyrics:
Hunter Pence, yo he eats his pizza with a fork
Hunter Pence, first Pokemon he chose was Bulbasaur
Hunter Pence, his flash drive? He always safely removes it
And he keeps the stickers on no matter how long he’s used it
Hunter Pence, claps at the wrong part of the Friends theme
Hunter Pence, likes mild salsa. Red? No, green.
Hunter Pence, rap songs? He likes the clean version best.
And he always reads the TOS before he clicks next.
Hunter Pence, I can’t believe that he doesn’t love Raymond.
Hunter Pence, did you know he’s not a big fan of bacon?
Hunter Pence, yo he eats his pizza with a fork
Hunter Pence, he’s too shy to get a table at Costco
And he actually knows what counts as compost
Hunter Pence, watching Space Jam always makes him cry
Hunter Pence, needs his hands to multiply by 9
Hunter Pence, can’t spell definitely on his first try
Hunter Pence, and he makes his own Hunter Pence signs

transcript_chunks.text: oh hey guys where's Tim oh he's filming this rap video with the World Series champion Hunter Pence wait what yo it's your boy Tim Gettys I'm here with let's get Lexi yeah girl Kinda Funny production you know I'd like to introduce y'all to our good friend Hunter Pence let's go he eats his pizza with a fork P first Pokémon he chose was Bulbasaur p last drive he always safely removes it and he keeps the stickers on no matter how long he's used it P claps at the wrong part of the Friends theme likes mild salsa red no green red s he likes the clean version best and he always reads the TOS before he clicks next I can't believe that he doesn't love Raymond did you know he's not a big fan of bacon it's too shy to get a table at Costco and he actually knows what counts as compost pants watch Space Jam always makes him cry pants needs his hands to multiply by nine p can't spell definitely on his first try h p and he makes his own Hunter Pence signs

Hunter Pence, watching Space Jam always makes him cry. Pants needs his hands to multiply by nine. P.C. felt definitely on his first try. H.P. and he makes his own Hunter Pence signs. What's up guys? Thank you so much for watching this video. And speaking of thank yous, thank you to Hunter Pence for being in this video and giving us this super awesome bobblehead of yourself that's signed to give away to one of you fans if you want to win it all you got to do is share this video on Facebook or Twitter we'll choose one of your random and send it your way. And if you enjoyed this video and you want to see more like this go to kindofunny.com to help support us make that happen until next time you can follow me on Twitter at Tim Gettys peace
